Legislator DKI Soroti Anggaran Konsultan Tata Kampung Kumuh Rp 556 Juta Per RW
04 Nov 2019, 13:42 by Antara
Jakarta - Anggota DPRD DKI Jakarta mempertanyakan anggaran konsultan penataan kampung kumuh untuk satu rukun warga (RW) di Jakarta sebesar Rp 556 juta. Anggaran itu ada di dalam dokumen Kebijakan Umum Anggaran-Prioritas Plafon Anggaran Sementara (KUA-PPAS) 2020.
Anggota Komisi D DPRD DKI Jakarta dari Fraksi PDIP, Yuke Yurike, dalam keterangannya di Jakarta, Senin, menyebutkan anggaran ini dalam dokumen KUA-PPAS bernama community action plan (CAP) untuk satu RW senilai Rp 556.112.770.
Rincian biaya langsung untuk personel Rp 475.800.000 dan biaya langsung non-personel Rp 29.757.030.
Biaya langsung personel itu terdiri atas tenaga ahli, fasilitator, surveyor, dan sebagainya. Sedangkan biaya langsung tidak personel ialah laporan teknis detail engineering design (DED), pelaksanaan sosialisasi dan focus group discussion (FGD).
Menurut Yuke, Komisi D DPRD DKI Jakarta terkejut melihat dan mendengarkan usulan Dinas Perumahan DKI Jakarta terkait CAP dalam rapat KUA-PPAS, meskipun dokumen tersebut bersifat sementara dan bisa saja dilakukan perubahan.
Menurut Yuke, anggaran CAP yang fungsinya hanya sebagai konsultan dalam penataan kampung kumuh itu terlalu mahal.
"Satu RW itu Rp 556 juta? Kalau 200 RW itu butuh berapa coba? Masa, tidak bisa kerja sama dengan kampus atau sebagainya?," ujar Yuke dilansir Antara, Senin (4/11/2019).

DKI Legislator Highlights Slum Kampung Tata Consultant Budget Rp. 556 Million Per RW
Nov 04 2019, 13:42 by Antara
Jakarta - Members of the DKI Jakarta Regional House of Representatives questioned the budget of a slum village structuring consultant for one neighborhood unit in Jakarta in the amount of Rp. 556 million. The budget is contained in the 2020 Provisional Budget Ceiling (KUA-PPAS) Priority General Policy document.
DKI Jakarta DPRD Commission D member from the PDIP Faction, Yuke Yurike, in his statement in Jakarta on Monday, mentioned this budget in a KUA-PPAS document called community action plan (CAP) for one RW worth Rp 556,112,770.
Details of direct costs for personnel IDR 475,800,000 and non-personnel direct costs IDR 29,757,030.
The direct costs of the personnel consist of experts, facilitators, surveyors, and so on. Whereas direct personnel costs are the detailed engineering design (DED) technical report, the implementation of the socialization and focus group discussion (FGD).
According to Yuke, Commission D of the DKI Jakarta DPRD was surprised to see and listen to the DKI Jakarta Housing Agency's proposal regarding the CAP in the KUA-PPAS meeting, even though the document was temporary and could have been changed.
According to Yuke, the CAP budget, whose function is only as a consultant in the arrangement of slums, is too expensive.
"One RW is Rp. 556 million? How many 200 RWs do you need? How come, you can't cooperate with the campus or so on," Yuke said. Antara reported on Monday (11/04/2019).
